item.description:
In cooperation with the RiversEdge Photographic Society we are planning the Sixth RiversEdge Schooner Shoot on Sunday afternoon, August 21.  The sleek and photogenic schooner Lannnon in Gloucester harbor will host the event. We will have 4 experienced models and a maximum of 12 photographers, for a 3:1 photographer to model ratio.  Models will model swimsuits and casual clothing.  This is a fun event that many photographers return to year after year.

The schooner will sail promptly at 5:30 pm for a 2 1/2 hour cruise.  The sun sets during the last hour of the cruise, providing some great sky colors if the weather is nice.

The cost is $150 per photographer (or a discounted $140 rate if you are a RiversEdge member). We have reached the maximum of 12 photographers, so this event is now closed except in the unlikely event that a photographer cancels out.
item.how_to_find_us: Be at the schooner's departure place by 5:00 pm.
item.name: Schooner Shoot in Gloucester Harbor
